journey.title: My Development Journey
journey.subtitle: I develop sustainable solutions by combining my experiences from different projects.

card1.title: Experience with Real Projects
card1.text: I actively used programming languages such as C#, SQL, Python, and JavaScript in real projects. I developed applications that provide solutions to various technological needs, from desktop automation systems to web-based platforms. I have hands-on experience in database management, API integration, user interface design, and data analysis.

card2.title: Mastery in Development Processes
card2.text: I am proficient in all phases of the software development lifecycle, from analysis to deployment. I manage my projects by following the core steps of the software lifecycle: requirement analysis, system design, coding, testing, deployment, and maintenance. I handle task and sprint management with tools like Jira and coordinate team workflows efficiently using Git.

card3.title: Touching the Mobile World
card3.text: I develop performant and user-friendly mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms using React Native and Flutter. With modern infrastructures like Expo and Firebase, I implement features such as authentication, real-time data management, and notifications. I gained experience in both individual and team-based projects by developing health-oriented apps like step counters and route trackers approved by the Ministry of Youth and Sports, as well as daily-use solutions like a KYK meal menu app.

career.title: My Career Goals
career.text: I approach software development not only as an engineering practice but also as a creative art that facilitates human life. Writing code is a tool for me; my main goal is to develop functional, user-friendly, and sustainable products. In the early years of my career, I aim to deepen my knowledge in mobile and web technologies, analyze user needs accurately, produce rapid prototypes, and adopt feedback-driven iterative development. I actively take full responsibility in product development processes by using modern technologies such as React, Flutter, and Firebase. In the midterm, I aim to move into areas like technical leadership, software architecture, and product management‚Äîplaying an active role in team leadership, project planning, and technological decision-making. By adhering to Agile principles, I prioritize team coordination and customer-oriented solution generation. In the long term, I aspire to work in leadership positions at vision-driven companies, produce innovative and scalable software solutions, and contribute to the industry's growth by mentoring young developers.
